courses.name: Introduction to Computer Science
courses.description: An introductory course to the fundamentals of computer science, covering algorithms, data structures, and basic programming.
learningOutcomes: Understand the foundational principles of computer science
Apply basic programming concepts in a modern programming language
Analyze and implement simple data structures and algorithms

courses.name: Principles of Economics
courses.description: Explore the principles of micro and macroeconomics, including market structures, fiscal policies, and economic theories.
learningOutcomes: Explain the principles of micro and macroeconomics
Analyze economic policies and their impact on economies
Understand market structures and predict their behaviors

courses.name: World History: 1500 to Present
courses.description: A comprehensive overview of world history from the 1500s to the current day, focusing on global developments and cultural exchanges.
learningOutcomes: Trace the major global events from 1500 to present
Understand the impacts of cultural exchanges in shaping the modern world

courses.name: Introduction to Philosophy
courses.description: Dive into the major areas of philosophy, including metaphysics, ethics, logic, and epistemology, and explore how they inform contemporary issues.
learningOutcomes: Identify and explain the main areas of philosophical inquiry
Apply philosophical reasoning to contemporary issues

courses.name: Basics of Programming with Python
courses.description: Learn programming fundamentals and problem-solving techniques using Python. Suitable for beginners with no prior programming experience.
learningOutcomes: Solve basic computational problems using Python
Understand the syntax and semantics of the Python programming language
